name: hqtrivia-solver
description: TODO: - [ ] Setup IOScapture app to capture screenshots from IOS directly on Macbook (other methods might also work, it just needs a quick way (i'm talking about milliseconds here) to get the image on the computer) - [ ] Create node.js script to watch for new files in certain directory - [ ] Crop new screenshot en use Tesseract.js library to extract the question and possible answers - [ ] Use NLP to clean text and extract keywords - [ ] User several API's like google/bing/wikipedia to score each possible answer - [ ] Get that HQTrivia cash yo!
